_header: In winter when the weather was cold
_description: Thomas Brampton’s version of the Seven Penitential Psalms — 8-line stanzas

CamMagPep2030.First Lines:
…My synfull werkys bothe more and lesseNe remiscarys
                    domine…
CamMagPep2030.Last Lines:
…And devoutely cry and craveNe ne reminiscarus
                    domine
CamMagPep2030.Note: Begins at line 7 of stanza 7; lacks stanzas 121-4.
